experience.title: Fullstack Engineer 3
responsibilities: Led development of critical app features: onboarding, ban appeals, and app integration of content management systems

Built a lightweight web app using vanilla JavaScript, enabling seamless data access for users with low or intermittent bandwidth
Implemented a CMS-based static content solution, automating workflows and saving 20+ developer hours per month
Designed and launched ban screens and a ban appeal center, streamlining the ban resolution process
Automated Protobuf tooling, eliminating manual code generation and improving developer velocity

experience.title: Software Development Engineer 2
responsibilities: Refactored app architecture, enabling a simpler, declarative interface for adding and updating Mojang games
Maintained and enhanced skin rendering systems in Three.js, ensuring seamless visual performance
Resolved long-standing, complex bugs in message passing between the C++ backend and React frontend, improving system stability
Accelerated CI/CD pipeline by 50% through job parallelization
Mentored junior frontend developers on architecture decisions and software design

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led decoupling of the frontend and backend in a monolithic application, eliminating the need for an embedded JavaScript runtime within the Ruby environment
Developed APIs in Node.js and Ruby on Rails, enabling features such as reCAPTCHA, festival notification management, and internationalization

Implemented currency internationalization on both the client and Node.js backend
Improved code quality and reduced bugs by developing a front-end testing environment and integrating TypeScript.

experience.title: Front End Engineer - Open Source Project
